ygData.subject: Test Server
ygData.msgSnippet: I d tend to share Vespair opinion : I have some characters there who are actually test characters for me. :) But they are quite low levels and my main guys
ygData.messageBody:
I'd tend to share Vespair opinion : I have some characters there who
are actually "test" characters for me. :)
But they are quite low levels and my main guys are on real servers.
Any way I love to go on the test server. When I don't have enough
time to play my bigger characters I can always ramble around with my
small test guys who are, slowly growing.
Another point is that they reset server and boot people without
warning usually, and I didn't pay for this as a permanent effect!

Thormael

>From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>
>
>RE: [EverQuest] Dark Elf Shadow Warrior - Newbie Fodderwheres the
fun in not taking a risk
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Whitmore, Lance
> Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Dark Elf Shadow Warrior - Newbie Fodder
>
> This is all very well but i would not advise new players to use
the Test Server simply because Varent has said that characters
created on the test server are not immune from player wipes. I would
not feel very well if i had worked up my player 10+ lvls and found
that one day, the character was deleted... its great for users to
spend some time there.. heck i have 3 characters on there myself..
I just wouldnt advise a newbie to start there.
>
> Vespair
